I needed new jammies for a girl's weekend, and these fit the bill!! They are soft, roomy, and comfortable. The fabric is a bit thicker - not thin at all so it isn't see through (and it gave a little more warmth during a fall lake evening). I ordered the Large. I'm 5'4", 160#, pear shaped... A medium would have fit just fine, but I like my jammies loose. There is a bit of a chemical/fabric smell that took a couple of washes to get out, but it is worth it.

Finally a set that actually uses quality material, quality stitching, and sizes are correct to US standards. Tried so many others from Amazon, and many are made overseas as is this one, but this brand is spot on with sizing and quality. So much so that I have ordered a set with long pants (from same brand) for lounging in cooler climates. I'll likely buy more in different colors. I've already washed the set in cold water and hung to dry as to not shrink it. Highly recommend.
